Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 5; C1: 4; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 3; C6: 2; C7: 2; C8: 1; C9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: C: 8; W: 9 Spell DC: C: 16; W: 17
Spells:
Alarm (W1 Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated Tiny or larger creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Beacon Of Hope (C3 Abju): R30' Targets gain advantage on Wisdom and death saves and regain maximum hit points from healing for concentration up to 1 min
Blade Ward (W0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Bless (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Blindness/Deafness (C2 Necr): R30' Inflicts a choice of blindness or deafness (save Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Control Water (C4 Tran): R300' Water in a 100' cube rises 20', parts, redirects, or forms a whirlpool for concentration up to 10 min
Create Undead (C6 Necr): R10' 3 corpses become ghouls that obey commands within 120' for 1 day [+Level creates 4 ghouls; 5 ghouls, 2 ghasts, or 2 wights; or 6 ghouls, 3 ghasts, 3 wights, or 2 mummies at level 7, 8, or 9]
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Evil And Good (C5 Abju): Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead suffer disadvantage on attacks vs. self for concentration up to 1 min; a successful spell attack returns them to their home plane (save Charisma negates), and touch also ends their enchantment, fright, or possession on the creature touched
Dream (C5 [Moon Domain] Illu): Touched controls the dreams of a known target for 8 hr and can inflict 3d6 HP psychic (save Wisdom negates)
Etherealness (C7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr [+Level affects +2 or +5 targets at level 8 or 9]
Faerie Fire (C1 [Moon Domain] Evoc): R60' Objects in a 20' cube glow, giving foes advantage on attacks (save Dexterity negates), for concentration up to 1 min
Freedom Of Movement (C4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Geas (C5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Greater Invisibility (C4 [Moon Domain] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 min
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (save Dexterity half) for 8 hr or until 60 HP inflicted
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Guiding Bolt (C1 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Hallow (C5 Evoc): 60' radius becomes warded against celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and their effects and evokes a boon effect
Hallucinatory Terrain (C4 [Moon Domain] Illu): R300' Creates a 150' cube terrain illusion (Investigation detects) for 1 day
Holy Aura (C8 Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain advantage on saves, inflict disadvantage on attackers, and blind successful fiend and undead melee attackers (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Hypnotic Pattern (C3 [Moon Domain] Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become incapacitated (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min; taking damage ends the effects
Invisibility (C2 [Moon Domain] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Major Image (C3 [Moon Domain] Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level extends the duration to permanent at level 6]
Mass Heal (C9 Evoc): R60' Targets regain 700 HP total and recover from blindness, deafness, and disease
Moonbeam (C2 [Moon Domain] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (save Constitution half; shapechangers have disadvantage and revert form on failure) and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Passwall (C5 [Moon Domain] Tran): R30' Creates a 5'x8'x20' passage through wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr
Planar Ally (C6 Conj): R60' Bargains for service from an otherworldly entity
Protection From Poison (C2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains advantage on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Resurrection (C7 Necr): Restores life with full hit points to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 100-year-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Revivify (C3 Necr): Restores life and 1 hit point to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Inflicts 4d8 HP radiant (save Dexterity negates)
Silent Image (C1 [Moon Domain] Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched dying creature becomes stable
Spiritual Weapon (C2 Evoc): R60' Creates a spectral weapon that inflicts 1d8+2 HP and can move 20' and attack as a bonus action for 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP per 2 levels]
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Blessing Of The Blood-Drenched Moon: R30' May use Channel Divinity to give target Adv on attacks on foes that are adjacent to an ally for 10 min
Blessing Of The Watchful Moon: R30' May use Channel Divinity to give target +10 Speed and Adv on Perception and Survival (tracking and smell) for 1 hr
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 3 times per short rest
Clarity Of Catha: R30' May use Reaction to give target Adv on a Wisdom save 6/long rest
Divine Intervention: Has a 100% chance to gain help from The Moonweaver once per week
Eclipse Of Ill Omen: 60' radius dim red glow blocks other light and inflicts Disadv on saves; radiant damage by self also inflicts half speed and no healing on target, for conc up to 1 min 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells that inflict thunder damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Empowered Cantrips: +2 HP cleric cantrip damage
Mind Of Two Moons: May use Channel Divinity to maintain concentration on two Moon Domain spells simultaneously and to gain Adv on concentration Constitution saves
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
